channel.title: [508] RuneHub 508! [508] V2 is out! Clan Chat, much more!
channel.description:
Runehub is an old server, I'll provide some pics from back back far back when I was hosting it.
base is summonpkz by primadude
[url=http://www.mediafire.com/?g4ekzwnjn1k][size=20pt] DOWNLOAD V1[/size] [/url] [size=20pt][url=http://www.mediafire.com/?ymynytz5wim] DOWNLOAD V2 [/url][/size]
V1 Updates made TOTALLY by me:
[i][b]- FULL CLAN CHAT! (IM SUPER PROUD OF MYSELF :D) - Stable fishing base made by Primadude - You can now wield a TON more things - Base is summon-pkz, made by Primadude (everything prima makes is 13370wnag3) - Some more tuts by prima - Fixed some bugs - Ranging bug fixed 75% - Added some npcs - Added fisherman, he teles you to the fishing guild - Added fully working fishing spots (Also by prima :D) - Updated client, much better now if you look at the new coding. - You can understand a lot of things better now - Took out commands, added ::pure, ::tanker - Bone burying ftw! Works totally 100%, no problems. - Added Dragon Claws, In the game they're rune claws and spec hits X2 but it's powered correctly so it hits like it's X4 - Fully working 100% EventManager - Added some sick teles - Much more I really can't remember... It was a long time ago :o[/b][/i]
[i][b][shadow=red,left]V2 Updates I TOTALLY made:[/shadow][/b][/i] [i][b]Added a staffzone, upstairs in edgeville Added Wise Old Man dialogue for new moderators Staff cape only staff can wear!! Staff box, 100m each click! More items stackable (Noted: Dragon bones, Yew longbow (u), Yew longbow, and blue partyhats.) Lots more commands Jad points (I got the points but I cba to try to figure out how to make it so they add when you kill jad) Added a starter! 50M and an AGS! Changed tons of text[/b][/i]
[i][b]Features already in the server:
- Fully working equipment interface, rotating and all - Pretty glitchless pking, could use some work though - Full range on player. C'bow, D bow, all shortbows/longbows, knives, darts, etc... - More. I can't remember though. [/b][/i] [IMG]http://i34.tinypic.com/2vn2hjt.jpg[/img]
[IMG]http://i25.tinypic.com/adkj6r.jpg[/img]
[IMG]http://i37.tinypic.com/x4kpsg.jpg[/img]
[IMG]http://i38.tinypic.com/15hcvtw.jpg[/img]
[IMG]http://i36.tinypic.com/mbqz9c.jpg[/img]
[IMG]http://i35.tinypic.com/2i974.jpg[/img]
[IMG]http://i34.tinypic.com/2hmfnrr.jpg[/img]
[IMG]http://i38.tinypic.com/9j2jus.jpg[/img]
[IMG]http://i37.tinypic.com/aw2io7.jpg[/img]
[IMG]http://i34.tinypic.com/2i0q5g2.jpg[/img]
[b][size=30pt][font=Orange]V2 PICTURES:[/font][/size][/b]
[IMG]http://i37.tinypic.com/15hkj84.jpg[/img]
[IMG]http://i38.tinypic.com/264rjpf.jpg[/img]
[IMG]http://i37.tinypic.com/30ic2a9.jpg[/img]
[IMG]http://i35.tinypic.com/23m3dbn.jpg[/img]
[IMG]http://i37.tinypic.com/345naeo.jpg[/img]
[IMG]http://i35.tinypic.com/w0rfyg.jpg[/img]
[IMG]http://i37.tinypic.com/295q2ok.jpg[/img]
[IMG]http://i38.tinypic.com/3520j9g.jpg[/img]
[IMG]http://i37.tinypic.com/1yadc6.jpg[/img]
It's a really good server in my eyes.. I hope you like the pictures and download the server.
Download V1: http://www.mediafire.com/?g4ekzwnjn1k Download V2: http://www.mediafire.com/?ymynytz5wim
Credits:
Primadude Me Multiple ppl on google
